item.description:
Dear Westborough Spirituality Meetup member,

How are you?

We had a wonderful discussion. Thanks for all your sharing and inputs. It was a great!

Last time we discuss about "Causation". It likes an old saying" What comes around goes around". Everything happened to us has a reason. If we haven't understand that we may suffering between the process of learning.

If we can transform our mindset, than everything around us could be very different. I am the one starting the peaceful energy and I am also the one who stopping the vicious cycle. Even it is a tinny thing, but it may makes a huge different.

This month, we are going to share and discuss more about how to transform. So we have more deep understanding about causation and transform life.

If you would like to meet more friends with the same interest about seeking a spiritual life, please come and share your thoughts and experiences about how to practice spirituality in daily life.

Enjoy the day and letâ€™s create positive energy to the whole world. Hope see you all in our meetup.

Jonathan

About this Meetup Group
item.how_to_find_us: This will be the second building on your right when you come into condos or 617-223-7166 when have trouble to find
item.name: Westborough Spiritual October Meetup
